name: Clara McGinnis
review: I am a new member at this church.  The preaching is excellent (very Scriptural) and I love the fellowship.  If you are looking for a church that focusses on worshipping God and hearing His Word, than you will like Sovereign Grace.  I also like that the congregation is very friendly, genuine, and close.  We aren't just "church friends" here but get together often as friends for other activities.
